achievements.name: Friend in Need
achievements.description: Join a faction.

achievements.name: Time is on our side
achievements.description: Reach 1948.

achievements.name: Canada First
achievements.description: Join Axis as Canada .

achievements.name: We'll build it in a day
achievements.description: Research Construction V.

achievements.name: Transport Tycoon
achievements.description: Have at least 1000 convoys.

achievements.name: Destroyer of Worlds
achievements.description: Deploy a nuke.

achievements.name: Wunderwaffen
achievements.description: Has completed the Special Projects Nuclear Fission Bomb, Rocket Interceptor and Jet Engines.

achievements.name: United Netherlands
achievements.description: Conquer Belgium and Luxembourg as Netherlands .

achievements.name: Vive la France
achievements.description: Reach 1948 as France without capitulating or surrendering.

achievements.name: Master of War
achievements.description: Fully research a land, air and naval doctrine tree.

achievements.name: Mine is bigger than yours
achievements.description: Lead a faction with at least 20 members.

achievements.name: No country for old men
achievements.description: Reach 0 manpower with Scraping the Barrel as Conscription Law.

achievements.name: Poland can into space
achievements.description: Has completed the Special Project Rocket Interceptor.

achievements.name: True Blitzkrieg
achievements.description: As Germany have both Poland and France surrender before January 1st 1940.

achievements.name: Northern Light
achievements.description: As a Scandinavian country form your own faction, and have Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Finland in it.

achievements.name: Nobody expects...
achievements.description: As Nationalist Spain in Axis manage to take Paris before the Germans.

achievements.name: The bell tolls for us
achievements.description: Win Spanish Civil War as Republican Spain.

achievements.name: The Revolution Triumphant
achievements.description: Have Germany as a puppet of Soviet.

achievements.name: Once More Mate
achievements.description: Occupy Gallipoli as Australia.

achievements.name: Forge of Victory
achievements.description: Have 50 factories as Belgium.

achievements.name: Sunset Invasion
achievements.description: Occupy a coastal province in Europe as Mexico, and if in a faction have it contain only South American members or puppets.

achievements.name: Duce Nuked'em
achievements.description: Nuke Los Angeles as fascist Italy.

achievements.name: Operation Sea Lion
achievements.description: Control British mainland as Germany.

achievements.name: One Empire
achievements.description: Unite the entire world under the British Empire.

achievements.name: Party like it's 1520
achievements.description: Occupy Stockholm as communist Denmark.

achievements.name: Med plutonium...
achievements.description: Nuke Denmark as Sweden.

achievements.name: The Revenge of Montezuma
achievements.description: Restore the old borders with USA as Mexico.

achievements.name: Big Entente
achievements.description: As France, complete the “Little Entente” National Focus, and have all German cores owned by you or someone in your faction.

achievements.name: New World Order
achievements.description: Make all nations fascist.

achievements.name: Braaaaains!
achievements.description: As Canada, complete the Send in the Zombies focus.

achievements.name: District 9
achievements.description: As South Africa, have 9 civilian factories in Transvaal.

achievements.name: Our Words Are Backed With Nuclear Weapons
achievements.description: As India, develop and deploy a nuke. You must have the Quit India Movement national spirit.

achievements.name: Crusader Kings
achievements.description: As South Africa, finish the A King for our People focus and take Jerusalem.

achievements.name: Crusader Kings 2
achievements.description: As South Africa, finish the Anti-Colonialist Crusade focus, release all European colonies via the focus, and take London.

achievements.name: Rule Britannia
achievements.description: As any British Subject state, conquer all of Britain.

achievements.name: Cut The Strings
achievements.description: Break free from your overlord as a puppet.

achievements.name: It's 1812 All Over Again
achievements.description: As Canada, take and hold Washington D.C.

achievements.name: The weapons of the Third Emu War
achievements.description: As Australia, use a nuclear bomb on core Australian territory.

achievements.name: I Am the Tong Master
achievements.description: As South Africa, break free from the UK and puppet another nation.

achievements.name: The Empire Strikes Back
achievements.description: As Britain, declare war on one of your former subjects.

achievements.name: The Puppetmaster
achievements.description: Have at least 51 subjects.

achievements.name: Freegypt
achievements.description: As Egypt, go from puppet to a free nation using the autonomy system.

achievements.name: Miklos Horthy and the Habsburg Prince
achievements.description: As Hungary, restore Austria-Hungary.

achievements.name: Better than the Szent István
achievements.description: As Hungary, have Miklos Horthy as a Naval commander and build a battleship.

achievements.name: Death or Dishonor or Cake
achievements.description: As Romania, own a slice of all your starting neighbors.

achievements.name: Neither Death nor Dishonor
achievements.description: As Romania, make it to 1942 with all the states you started it with and control either Moscow or Berlin.

achievements.name: The Munich Disagreement
achievements.description: As Czechoslovakia, occupy Munich while at war with Germany.

achievements.name: Czechmate
achievements.description: As Czechoslovakia, occupy Canberra while at war with the Allies.

achievements.name: Huge-oslavia
achievements.description: As Yugoslavia, occupy all your neighbouring countries (Austria, Hungary, Romania, Bulgaria, Albania, Italy and Greece).

achievements.name: The Balkan Powder Keg
achievements.description: As Yugoslavia, start the Second World War (i.e. be part of either the Axis or the Allies and at war with the other faction in a war you started).

achievements.name: En Svensk Tiger
achievements.description: As Sweden, acquire a production license for a Tiger or Tiger II tank from Germany.

achievements.name: Lethal Straight
achievements.description: Have a production license from at least 5 of the 7 major powers.

achievements.name: Awake and Angry
achievements.description: As China, reconquer all of China and Manchuria and force a Japanese surrender.

achievements.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms
achievements.description: As China, puppet and then annex Yunnan and Guangxi Clique.

achievements.name: Sun Tzu Reborn
achievements.description: As Any Chinese Nation, have a level 9 field marshal.

achievements.name: The People Have Stood Up!
achievements.description: With Mao as your leader, win the Chinese Civil War.

achievements.name: Made in China
achievements.description: As Communist China, have over 100 military factories.

achievements.name: Tojo Shot First
achievements.description: As Japan, nuke a core territory of the US before the US develops nuclear weapons.

achievements.name: Sunrise Invasion
achievements.description: As Japan, conquer Mexico then Europe before 1945.

achievements.name: The Dragon Swallowed the Sun
achievements.description: As Manchukuo, break free from Japan and annex your former Overlord without being in a faction.

achievements.name: Hail to the Qing
achievements.description: As Manchukuo, restore the Qing dynasty.

achievements.name: The Good, the Bad and the Weird
achievements.description: As Manchukuo, have max level infrastructure in every owned state and generate at least 15 units of oil.

achievements.name: Battlecry
achievements.description: As a warlord, conquer all of China and Japan.

achievements.name: Panda-monium
achievements.description: As a warlord, be at war with all chinese nations simultaneously.

achievements.name: Make a Man Out Of You
achievements.description: As a warlord, have at least 1.000.000 manpower queued up for deployment.

achievements.name: Our Other Place in the Sun
achievements.description: As Imperial Germany, conquer a Caribbean island.

achievements.name: Australia-Hungary
achievements.description: As Australia, own all core territory of Hungary.

achievements.name: My Ships Don't Lie
achievements.description: As Colombia, form Gran Colombia and have 10 Carriers and 10 Battleships.

achievements.name: I Swear I’m Not a Byzantophile
achievements.description: As Greece, Form Byzantine Empire.

achievements.name: Monarchy is Back In Fashion
achievements.description: As Germany, bring back the Kaiser and ensure that Italy is controlled by Victor Emmanuel by killing Mussolini.

achievements.name: Team America
achievements.description: As the U.S.A., drop a nuclear bomb on Paris.

achievements.name: History Repeated Itself
achievements.description: As the U.S.A., win against the Confederate States. Again.

achievements.name: Georgia On My Mind
achievements.description: As the U.S.A., own and fully control all three Georgias.

achievements.name: To Arms in Dixie!
achievements.description: As the U.S.A., start a new civil war as the South.

achievements.name: Arsenal of Democracy
achievements.description: As the U.S.A., have more than 300 military factories.

achievements.name: Underpaid, Undersexed, and Under Eisenhower
achievements.description: As the U.S.A., assume faction leadership of the Allies, and have over 50 expeditionary divisions from the United Kingdom.

achievements.name: Last for a Thousand Years
achievements.description: As the United Kingdom, accomplish the federation of the entire British Empire.

achievements.name: Britzkrieg
achievements.description: As the United Kingdom, put Edward VIII in power, ally Germany, and fully control Paris.

achievements.name: Nothing Wrong with our Bloody Ships
achievements.description: As the United Kingdom, have at least 9 battlecruisers.

achievements.name: William Wallis
achievements.description: As the United Kingdom, put Edward VIII in power, enforce an American monarchy, and have both it and Scotland as subjects.

achievements.name: Crush the Dream
achievements.description: As a Communist United Kingdom, crush the American Dream by puppeting the U.S.A.

achievements.name: Treading the Narrow Path
achievements.description: As the Netherlands, do not cave to the Germans, continue the Zuiderzee works, and do not lose control of any of your continental European states until 1945.

achievements.name: Putting the Raid on the Medway to Shame
achievements.description: As the Netherlands, ensure the United Kingdom has no capital ships (carriers, battleships, battlecruisers, or heavy cruisers).

achievements.name: Bevrijding
achievements.description: As the Netherlands, liberate the continental Netherlands after relocating the government to the East Indies.

achievements.name: Mi Casa es tu Casa
achievements.description: As Mexico, host a government-in-exile.

achievements.name: The New Home of the Revolution
achievements.description: As Mexico, put Trotsky in power and puppet the Soviet Union.

achievements.name: Assuming Direct Control
achievements.description: Starting as a minor power, assume faction leadership of the Allies, the Axis, or the Comintern.

achievements.name: Vive la Jeune Ecole
achievements.description: As France, have at least 150 Destroyers and research the maximum torpedo launcher technology, before 1945.

achievements.name: 30 Minutes of Hel
achievements.description: As Poland in the 1939 “Blitzkrieg” scenario start, inflict over 1,800,000 casualties to Germany to beat the 2018 PDXCON HOI4 challenge. Extra bragging rights if you do it in 30 minutes or less!

achievements.name: Pride and Extreme Prejudice
achievements.description: Sink the British Pride of the Fleet.

achievements.name: Do You Mined?
achievements.description: Lay at least 1,000 mines on the coastline of an enemy nation.

achievements.name: BFFs
achievements.description: As Portugal, join the same faction as Great Britain.

achievements.name: Man of a Thousand Faces, Every One the Same
achievements.description: Have the same spy get captured twice.

achievements.name: We Will Rock You
achievements.description: As Spain, own Gibraltar.

achievements.name: Warszawo, Walcz!
achievements.description: Stage the Warsaw uprising and succeed.

achievements.name: Play It, Sam
achievements.description: Have a spy network of at least 50% strength in Casablanca.

achievements.name: Shaken, Not Stirred
achievements.description: Successfully stage a coup in any nation using a spy with the Seducer trait.

achievements.name: Listen Very Carefully, I Shall Say This...
achievements.description: Have a French and British spy work together on the same Operation.

achievements.name: One King, Two Crowns
achievements.description: As Bourbon Spain, hold all Spanish and French core states.

achievements.name: Well, I Didn’t Vote for You
achievements.description: Win the Spanish Civil War as the Anarchists.

achievements.name: Die, Perfidious Albion!
achievements.description: As Fascist France or Vichy France, occupy all of Great Britain.

achievements.name: Spies Trade
achievements.description: As India, become the spymaster for the Allies.

achievements.name: You Will Never Kill Me Alive
achievements.description: Have one of your spies take a Suicide Pill.

achievements.name: I SEE EVERYTHING
achievements.description: Get over 90% intel in each category on a major without using code cracking.

achievements.name: Turing Complete!
achievements.description: Fully decrypt all nations in the Axis.

achievements.name: Our Chief Weapon is Surprise...
achievements.description: As Spain, have at least 5 spies and stage 5 coups against other nations.

achievements.name: Second Time’s the Charm
achievements.description: As France, occupy Moscow while Napoleon VI is your country leader.

achievements.name: Why Die For Danzig?
achievements.description: As Germany, turn France fascist and occupy Danzig without going to war with France.

achievements.name: Tour de France
achievements.description: Occupy all of mainland France while having at least 20 fully equipped Bicycle regiments.

achievements.name: Go Ahead, Macau My Day
achievements.description: As Portugal, create a collaboration government in Macau and have it own all Chinese states.

achievements.name: Don’t Die for Your Country
achievements.description: As Germany in a 1939 start, occupy all of Poland and France without taking more than 475 casualties.

achievements.name: Finnish Him!
achievements.description: As Finland, defeat the Soviet Union without joining a faction.

achievements.name: I Captured the Bosporus and All I Got Was This Lousy Achievement
achievements.description: As Greece or Bulgaria, own both sides of the Bosporus. As Turkey, subjugate both Greece & Bulgaria.

achievements.name: Istanbul is Constantinople. Again.
achievements.description: As Greece, capture Istanbul and rename it to Constantinople.

achievements.name: Peter’s Pride
achievements.description: As Peter II of Yugoslavia, overthrow your uncle and become King.

achievements.name: This is Madness!
achievements.description: As Greece, fulfill the Megali Idea and then form Greater Greece.

achievements.name: Nobody’s Business but the Turks
achievements.description: Restore the Ottoman Sultanate.

achievements.name: House of Kurds
achievements.description: As Kurdistan, hold all of your cores.

achievements.name: Hellenic Civility
achievements.description: Win the Greek Civil War before 1937.

achievements.name: Hoofin’ It
achievements.description: Unite Arabia with thirty camelry divisions.

achievements.name: We’re Putting the Band Back Together
achievements.description: As Turkey, be in a faction with Germany and Austria-Hungary.

achievements.name: Dracula’s Revenge
achievements.description: As Yugoslavia, establish the autonomous region of Transylvania and have it own all Romanian cores.

achievements.name: Prussia of the Balkans
achievements.description: As Bulgaria capitulate Turkey while also controlling the rest of the Balkans, including Greece.

achievements.name: Balkan Problem Solved
achievements.description: As Communist Bulgaria, form the United Balkan Federation and own all Balkan states as cores.

achievements.name: Bad Romeance
achievements.description: Restore Byzantium and have Italy, Romania, and Russia as subjects.

achievements.name: Totally Not Cool, Bromania
achievements.description: As Romania, change sides in the war and capitulate a former ally.

achievements.name: Freedom or Death
achievements.description: As Greece, liberate Albania while being at war with Italy.

achievements.name: Now This is Getting Childish
achievements.description: As Yugoslavia or Bulgaria, be at war while both countries are ruled by a child.

achievements.name: Hardly Anything Sèvres
achievements.description: As the Ottoman Empire, hold the capitals of France, the United Kingdom, Italy, and Japan.

achievements.name: One Nation Under Atatürk, Indivisible
achievements.description: As non-aligned Turkey, have zero negative state modifiers.

achievements.name: Master Puppeteer
achievements.description: As Bulgaria, complete the focus The Fate of the Balkans while having 5 or more Balkan puppets.

achievements.name: At least they run on time!
achievements.description: As fascist Italy, have max level railways in all your core states

achievements.name: Not much fun in Stalingrad
achievements.description: As Germany, capitulate the Soviet Union without taking Stalingrad.

achievements.name: No more Partitions
achievements.description: As Poland, be independent and ensure that both Germany and the USSR are either in your faction or don’t exist.

achievements.name: Habsburgs. Habsburgs everywhere
achievements.description: As Poland, install a Habsburg monarch and be in a faction with another Habsburg monarch.

achievements.name: The Pope? How many Divisions does he have?
achievements.description: As the USSR take Rome.

achievements.name: This is going to be LIT
achievements.description: As Lithuania, hold the capitals of all of your neighbours.

achievements.name: It has my name on it
achievements.description: As any Baltic State, conquer the entire shoreline of the Baltic Sea.

achievements.name: This Achievement is Cheesy
achievements.description: As Latvia, form Ostland and occupy Vasterbotten.

achievements.name: Esti is Scandi
achievements.description: As Estonia Secure Scandinavia.

achievements.name: Not a step back!
achievements.description: As the Soviet Union never lose 1 core territory to anyone before 1945.

achievements.name: One Step Forward
achievements.description: As Soviet Union declare a war on Poland and Germany before Germany attacks Poland.

achievements.name: The Soviet Onion
achievements.description: As the Soviet Union, have only puppets as neighbors.

achievements.name: Crusader Kings III
achievements.description: As Poland, crown a King (or Queen) and capture Jerusalem.

achievements.name: The Romanovs laugh last
achievements.description: Restore the Romanovs to the throne and conquer Germany, Hungary, Austria, Czechoslovakia,Turkey, and Bulgaria.

achievements.name: We don’t really like statistics
achievements.description: As the Soviet Union under Stalin, conquer Germany while suffering less than 1 million casualties total.

achievements.name: Race for Germany
achievements.description: As the Soviet union, capitulate Germany after the fall of France before the allies control one German core state.

achievements.name: Siberian Tiger
achievements.description: As Tannu Tuva, form Siberia.

achievements.name: Just proper gander
achievements.description: As the Soviet Union, activate 30 propaganda campaigns before 1945.

achievements.name: Around Eurasia in 80 days
achievements.description: Make a railroad from Gibraltar to Singapore.

achievements.name: Poland Peasant Revolution
achievements.description: As Poland, have the Peasant’s Strike overthrow the government.

achievements.name: ...and you get a canton, everybody gets a canton!
achievements.description: As Switzerland, have 24 states

achievements.name: I’m not locked in here with you…
achievements.description: As Switzerland, declare war on Germany and win.

achievements.name: Swiss Cheese
achievements.description: As Switzerland annex 5 states that are not contiguous with each other or Switzerland.

achievements.name: You Shall Not Pass
achievements.description: As Switzerland win a defensive war without ever losing Western Swiss Alps, Eastern Swiss Alps or Ticino

achievements.name: The Lion that Roared
achievements.description: As Ethiopia, without being in a faction, force the Italians to make peace. Again.

achievements.name: The Lion King
achievements.description: As Haile Selassie, declare yourself “King of Kings” and control Kenya and Tanzania.

achievements.name: This time for Africa
achievements.description: As Ethiopia, found the African Union and have it encompass at least 13 different countries with capitals in Africa.

achievements.name: Crusader Kings IV
achievements.description: Take Jerusalem as Ethiopia and move the capital there

achievements.name: The Red Sea
achievements.description: As Ethiopia, go communist and take all the states that border the Red Sea

achievements.name: Holy, Roman, and an Empire
achievements.description: As the Pope, restore Rome.

achievements.name: Pizza Time!
achievements.description: As Italy, occupy New York, Chicago and Hawaii

achievements.name: Collect all the Romes
achievements.description: As Italy, continue holding onto the First Rome, and gain the second and third Rome

achievements.name: Nothing personal, Adolf
achievements.description: As Italy, take Austria before the Anschluss and never enter a faction with a fascist Germany

achievements.name: Not today
achievements.description: As communist Italy, save Gramsci from the brink of death, make him the leader of Italy and form the Italian National Union.

achievements.name: This time it will stick
achievements.description: As any Allied Nation (in faction with a democratic Britain), enforce a peacedeal on Germany that disarms the Rhineland and makes it a demilitarized zone.

achievements.name: By Beer Alone
achievements.description: As Germany, control Budweis, Tsingtao, and Guinness directly or through a faction member

achievements.name: By merit alone
achievements.description: Promote a Unit Commander to a general, and reach max level

achievements.name: Snakes on a plane
achievements.description: As Brazil, capture Rome with paratroopers.

achievements.name: Stalin, how many guns does he have?
achievements.description: As the pope, capitulate the USSR

achievements.name: Sapmi united by the fire
achievements.description: As Sami, own and control every Sami core.

achievements.name: Norway Jose
achievements.description: As Norway, own and control every Mexican core.

achievements.name: Pinot Noirway
achievements.description: As Norway, own and control the state of Bourgogne.

achievements.name: Cheese your fighter.
achievements.description: As Norway, with Peder Jarlsberg as country leader, own Telemark, Glouchestershire, Normandy, Lombardia and Holland.

achievements.name: Med plutonium 2.
achievements.description: As Denmark nuke Sweden.

achievements.name: Everything is awesome.
achievements.description: As Denmark, get Maximum Welfare Spending after January 1st 1941 without being puppeted or capitulating.

achievements.name: The Danelaw
achievements.description: As Denmark, conquer England.

achievements.name: Vinland
achievements.description: As Iceland, conquer Newfoundland

achievements.name: Brexit
achievements.description: As communist Iceland, make Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland rise up against the United Kingdom

achievements.name: Two Arms Against Tyranny.
achievements.description: As Finland, capitulate the Soviet Union while having a 2 country faction with another Nordic

achievements.name: Uralic brothers united
achievements.description: As Finland, have Hungary, Estonia, Sapmi, Karelia, Mari El, Udmurtia, Komi, Ostyak-Vogulia, Yamalia and Nenetsia as subjects

achievements.name: Lone Wolf
achievements.description: As Finland, form Greater Finland and own every core and claim without having ever joined a faction

achievements.name: No one crosses the finnish line
achievements.description: As non-aligned Finland, survive the Soviet Union until September 19th 1944 without losing control of a single core ever.

achievements.name: Danzig queen
achievements.description: As Sweden, own and control Danzig

achievements.name: Caramelldansen
achievements.description: As Sweden puppet Japan

achievements.name: The return of the king
achievements.description: As the exiled King of Gotland, retake mainland Sweden

achievements.name: Satisfactory
achievements.description: Have at least one MIO per category at level 10+

achievements.name: Cod wars
achievements.description: As Iceland capitulate the UK

achievements.name: The Magic School Bus
achievements.description: With the Per Albin Bus, drive to Cape Town.

achievements.name: Rumble in the Jungle
achievements.description: Own all amazon states as any South American nation.

achievements.name: And the snake smoked
achievements.description: As Brazil, in the allies, capitulate Germany while controlling Berlin.

achievements.name: Red Hot Chile Peppers
achievements.description: As Communist Chile, control California

achievements.name: Bad Ending - The whole world is now Brazil
achievements.description: Control every state in the world

achievements.name: A Land of Fire
achievements.description: Tierra del Fuego means "The Land of Fire"

achievements.name: I'm Home!
achievements.description: As Brazil occupy every core of Portugal

achievements.name: Proactive Defense
achievements.description: As any communist South or Central American country, occupy Washington D.C

achievements.name: The Merry Band
achievements.description: As communist brazil ruled by Lampião, occupy Nottingham

achievements.name: Somehow He Has Returned
achievements.description: As Argentina, have Senor Hitler become country leader

achievements.name: URSAL
achievements.description: Be communist and own all of South America

achievements.name: Islas Malvinas
achievements.description: As Argentina, hold the Falkland islands and South Georgia for 73 days consecutively

achievements.name: Lamento Boliviano
achievements.description: As Argentina, own all of Latin America except Bolivia

achievements.name: Revenge for the triple alliance
achievements.description: As Paraguay, declare war on Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay within the same month

achievements.name: The Dragon Rises
achievements.description: As "Welsh Argentina", control Wales

achievements.name: King of What?
achievements.description: Have Jaque Antoine Bernard as King of Chile and control Paris

achievements.name: True Condor Legion
achievements.description: As CHL, BOL, PRU, ECU, VEN, COL - sent volunteers to Germany

achievements.name: Chilean Empire
achievements.description: Control all mainland states that border the pacific in South America, North America and Asia

achievements.name: Reconquistadors
achievements.description: As Argentina or Chile, have a Conquistadors national spirit active while holding all Spanish cores

achievements.name: Hispanics of the world unite!
achievements.description: As Chile, form the Hispanic Alliance and have at least 8 "Hispanic" nations in your faction

achievements.name: Cisplatine War 2, Electric Boogaloo
achievements.description: As either Brazil or Argentina, be in a faction with Uruguay while at war with Brazil/Argentina

achievements.name: America Decolonized!
achievements.description: As Mapuche Chile liberate all native people in North and South America

achievements.name: Antischluss
achievements.description: As Austria, control all German starting states.

achievements.name: No Friends, Only Family
achievements.description: As Austria or Hungary led by a Habsburg Monarch, Control the Swiss Plateau and have at least three other countries be led by a member of the Habsburg family.

achievements.name: Edelweiss Seedelweiss
achievements.description: As Austria have a coastline, at least 10 Battleships and have Georg von Trapp as an Admiral

achievements.name: Otto-man
achievements.description: As Austria or Hungary, led by Otto von Habsburg, control the starting states of Austria, Hungary, Czechoslovakia, Romania, Bulgaria, Greece and Turkey as well as the states in Polish Galicia, Slovenia and Croatia.

achievements.name: Spaak of Genius
achievements.description: As Belgium, with Paul-Henri Spaak as country leader, research at least 10 different Special Projects.

achievements.name: Brentry
achievements.description: As Austria, Belgium or the Netherlands be the leader of the EU and have the United Kingdom join your faction.

achievements.name: The 501st Legion
achievements.description: As Belgium, have the National Spirit “Rexist Legion” and be in control of all of your starting neighbors’ Capitals

achievements.name: Congolese Belgium
achievements.description: As Congo break free from the shackles of your old overlord and take control of all of their starting states.

achievements.name: The Lenin Boys are Back in Town
achievements.description: As Communist Hungary bring back the Lenin-fiúk and take control over Leningrad

achievements.name: A Great Hunger
achievements.description: As Hungary proclaim Greater Hungary and control all of your historical state

achievements.name: Weltpolitik
achievements.description: As Germany take control of all of your former colonies

achievements.name: Naval Arms Race
achievements.description: As Germany led by an Admiral capitulate the United Kingdom.

achievements.name: Woman in a High Castle
achievements.description: As Germany with a female leader either annex the USA, including Alaska and Hawaii or have an American puppet that owns all the American starting states, including Alaska and Hawaii.

achievements.name: American Prometheus
achievements.description: As the USA have Robert Oppenheimer complete the Manhattan Project.

achievements.name: Tsar Bomba
achievements.description: As Tsarist Russia complete the Special Project for thermonuclear bombs.

achievements.name: Super Heavy Metal
achievements.description: Complete the Special Projects for Intercontinental Bombers, Land Cruisers, and Super Heavy Battleships.

achievements.name: Backfire
achievements.description: As the United Kingdom complete the Special Project for Medium Range Ballistic Missiles, have a rocket site, and be at war with Germany

achievements.name: Dam It!
achievements.description: Successfully execute a Dam Busting Raid

achievements.name: Bullseye
achievements.description: Successfully launch a raid on a Landmark

achievements.name: The True Successor
achievements.description: As Luxembourg led by Charles Marx control both Brussels and Trier.

achievements.name: Graveyard of Empires
achievements.description: As Afghanistan, Iran, Iraq or the Raj, control all of the other three nations' cores

achievements.name: This achievement is dedicated to the brave soldiers of...
achievements.description: As Afghanistan, capitulate the Soviet Union

achievements.name: I have the high ground
achievements.description: As Afghanistan, control all Himalyan states

achievements.name: Pesky Greeks
achievements.description: As Iran, become the owner of all Greek core states

achievements.name: The Sands of Time
achievements.description: As Iran, own the entire Middle East

achievements.name: The Legacy of Cyrus the Great
achievements.description: As Iran, become the owner of former Achaemenid Empire's states

achievements.name: From Tehran with Love
achievements.description: As Iran, guarantee Poland's independence and ensure it does not capitulate by 1945.

achievements.name: Cradle of Civilization
achievements.description: As Iraq, build the maximum infrastructure level in all core states and achieve 100% stability

achievements.name: It's Just Good Business
achievements.description: As the East India Company, own Suez and Panama

achievements.name: Media Mughal
achievements.description: As the Mughal Empire, complete Agency Upgrade Psychological Warfare, become Spy Master and have at least 8 operatives

achievements.name: Oh, how the turntables
achievements.description: As India puppet the UK with Churchill as it's leader

achievements.name: I'm just passing by
achievements.description: Own a state on each continent while being at peace

achievements.name: That's SIkh!
achievements.description: As Khalistan, control all of the starting Raj states

achievements.name: Oil Sheiks
achievements.description: As Iraq, have 500 oil production

achievements.name: Revenge for 1925
achievements.description: As Iraq, form the Hashemite Arab Federation and defeat Saudi Arabia

achievements.name: Avenging the Sack of Baghdad
achievements.description: As Iraq, control the capital of Mongolia

achievements.name: I shall either find a way or make one
achievements.description: Control Rome and have an elephant unit in the state.

achievements.name: Savior of the holy lands
achievements.description: As Afghanistan, become the owner of Palestine and Mecca
